strategy: World Eaters armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Black Legion Core, Elite and Support formations, as well as all Traitor Titan formations, have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the World Eaters, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: World Eaters Retinue
formations.units: Four Khorne Berzerkers, four Chaos Space Marines, one Skull Lord

sections.name: World Eaters Support Formations
sections.description: Two Support formations may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Skullseeker Terminators
formations.units: Four Skullseeker Terminators, one Skull Lord

formations.name: Juggernaut Riders
formations.units: Eight Juggernaut Riders, one Skull Lord, Daemonic Pact

formations.name: Berzerker Bikes
formations.units: Eight Khorne Berzerker Assault Bikes, one Skull Lord

formations.name: World Eaters Renegades
formations.units: Four Chaos Space Marines, two Chaos Rhinos, Daemonic Pact

sections.name: Minor Daemon Engine Formations
sections.description: One Minor Daemon Engine formations may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Khorne Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to three Slaughterfiends for 35 points each

sections.name: Major Daemon Engine and Chaos Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Greater Brass Scorpion
upgrades: Add one Greater Brass Scorpion for 175 points

formations.name: 0-1 Tower of Skulls
formations.units: One Tower of Skulls, Daemonic Pact

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Greater Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Greater Daemon Pool points. The first one is free.

upgrades.title: World Eaters Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Battleship
items.description: Replace the Devastation Class Cruiser with a Despoiler Class Battleship

options.description: Replace the Skull Lord with a Blood Lord
Replace the Skull Lord and its unit with a Daemon Prince of Khorne
Add up to four Chaos Rhinos
Add four World Eaters Land Raiders
(No more than needed to transport the formation with no space left over)

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Replace two Chaos Rhinos with two World Eaters Land Raiders

items.name: Daemonic Pact
items.description: Add Daemonic Pact to the formation, and one point to the Lesser Daemon Pool

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add two World Eaters Dreadnoughts to the formation

items.name: Champion
items.description: Add one Champion of Khorne character to the formation

items.name: Dreadclaws
items.description: Transport a formation containing only infantry units and Dreadnoughts in Dreadclaws (formation must be deployed on a space ship)

items.name: Berzerkers
items.description: Replace four Chaos Space Marines with four Khorne Berzerkers
